attributes.action: Give students more time in written exams.
attributes.additional_details: The Government and the department for Education can make this true. Especially due to loss of time and education during COVID.
attributes.background: E.g. In a Psychology exam you are given a minute for each mark. Model answers are often 2-4 paragraphs for an 8 mark question. However, in the exam we can't think of what to write, 'plan' our answers and write multiple paragraphs in 8 minutes! We are marked on technique not how quick we can do it.

rejection.details:
The time allowed for any given exam is a matter for the exam board providing the exam, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

Nevertheless you may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568162
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570499
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327397

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
